name: Midnight Quest
description:
An adventure quest game which tells a story of a young assistant who helps a famous scientist to conduct experiments with time. Once during an experiment in the laboratory, there was an explosion. As a result, the scientist died. You became alone in the middle of the night inside of a country house. A difficult situation isn't it? But you have a chance to fix it.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the late 19th century, enjoy an interesting story, get into unexpected situations. Solve puzzles on your way, meet friendly and not so friendly characters, invent time travel, and save your mentor.
